theresage madiwiye charithayata thama mama ranganayen dayaka wenne.chithrapatiya aarambha wenneth mage charithayen theresa nepalayata giya awasthawe aya dakinawa kuda lamun pirisak sellam karanawa ayata aage kuda kalaya saha ayage sahodaraya mathak wenawa eeth samagama kathawa athitheta gaman karanawa me chithrapatiye wadi kalayak gatha wenne athithawarjanayak widiyata.theresha kiyanne tharuna kalaye dushanayata lak wi dadi asadaranayata lak wu kenek.pasuwa aya itha dhanawath tharuniyak bawata path wenawa.aya namuth aya mula amathaka karanne na kotharam sapa sampath labunath aya soyanne ayahe kudakala nathu wu ohuge sahodarayawa.mama godak nirmanawala ragapala thibunath me charithaya wisheshayi.mamanam hithanawa mama ee charitheta sadharnayak itukala kiyala.namuth eeka hariyatama dana ganna puluwan wenne chithrapatiya narabana prekshakayange prathichara matha thamayi. 10.oba hithanawada pada yathra thulin minissu athare kanthawange ayithiwasikam gana aluth kathabahak athi weyi kiyala.
